name: YaleAccess
0:
”Alexa, lock the front door.”
”Alexa, is the front door locked?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This Yale Access skill allows you to:
- lock/unlock your door
- check the status of your Smart Lock

Connecting Your Yale Access Products to Alexa
Find information about connecting Smart Home devices at support.shopyalehome.com/en_us/integrating-with-amazon-alexa-HJtL1azdV

Required Yale Access Products
-To control a Yale Smart Lock with Alexa, you'll need a Yale Connect Wi-Fi Bridge.

Additional Support
For additional help, please visit https://support.shopyalehome.com/
